2011-02-27

BtVS: What's My Line / Note to self: religion freaky (Rules of Buffy #2: If you get an opportunity to despatch a particularly nasty demon... don't, it'll probably work out fine)

I'm sorry but religion is freaky, and the more I think about it the freakier it seems. I try to deal with it because there're so many religious people out there and I feel I ought to respect their views... there are even people I like... a lot... who believe in all this mumbo-jumbo - but if ever I start to think about it...

Anyway... What's My Line is a pretty cool double header here are some thoughts...

  • I know I'll say it every time but Oz = coolest
  • I like Kendra - she makes me smile
  • Careers Fair? What's that all about? Do you really tell kids what they might want to be based on multi-choice questions - it happened in The Simpsons too!?
  • "I was only gone for a minute"

I resisted last time but now it's getting silly - it would have taken five minutes to poke around in the rubble and pop stake through Dru and Spike's chests - but no, let's just assume they're dead...

Rules of Buffy # 2: If you get an opportunity to despatch a particularly nasty demon... don't, it'll probably work out fine

Anyway here's some freaky religious folk making beautiful music...
